--   at:        2014-01-01 00:43:43 PKT
--   site:      Oracle Database 12c
--   type:      Oracle Database 12c




CREATE TABLE CheckExams
  ( ExamStatus CHAR (1) NOT NULL
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE CheckExams ADD CONSTRAINT CheckExams_PK PRIMARY KEY ( ExamStatus ) ;


CREATE TABLE NoticeBoard
  (
    MessageID  NUMBER GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ,
    MESSAGE    VARCHAR2 (1500) NOT NULL ,
    "Date"     DATE NOT NULL
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE NoticeBoard ADD CONSTRAINT NoticeBoard_PK PRIMARY KEY ( MessageID ) ;


CREATE TABLE SCHEDULE
  (
    Class         VARCHAR2 (10) NOT NULL ,
    SubjectCode   VARCHAR2 (10) NOT NULL ,
    Subject       VARCHAR2 (80) NOT NULL ,
    Day           VARCHAR2 (10) NOT NULL ,
    Timeslot      VARCHAR2 (15) NOT NULL ,
    ClassroomNo   VARCHAR2 (10) NOT NULL
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE SCHEDULE ADD CONSTRAINT Schedule_PK PRIMARY KEY ( Class, Day, Timeslot ) ;


CREATE TABLE SeatingPlan
  (
    RegistrationNo  VARCHAR2 (30) NOT NULL ,
    "Date"          DATE NOT NULL ,
    Subject         VARCHAR2 (80) NOT NULL ,
    Timeslot        VARCHAR2 (15) NOT NULL ,
    ClassroomNo     NUMBER NOT NULL
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE SeatingPlan ADD CONSTRAINT SeatingPlan_PK PRIMARY KEY ( "Date", Timeslot, RegistrationNo ) ;


CREATE TABLE Sports
  (
    ItemID         NUMBER GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ,
    ItemName       VARCHAR2 (30) NOT NULL ,
    Quantity       NUMBER NOT NULL ,
    Availability   CHAR (1) NOT NULL ,
    StudentRegNo   VARCHAR2 (30) ,
    "Date"         DATE 
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Sports ADD CONSTRAINT Sports_PK PRIMARY KEY ( ItemID ) ;


CREATE TABLE Users
  (
    UserID          NUMBER GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ,
    RegistrationNo  VARCHAR2 (30) NOT NULL UNIQUE ,
    Name            VARCHAR2 (80) NOT NULL ,
    Class           VARCHAR2 (10) NOT NULL ,
    Email           VARCHAR2 (80) NOT NULL UNIQUE ,
    Password        VARCHAR2 (30) NOT NULL,
    Address         VARCHAR2 (80) NOT NULL,
    Phone	    VARCHAR2 (15) NOT NULL,
    Picture         VARCHAR2 (80) NOT NULL
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Users ADD CONSTRAINT Users_PK PRIMARY KEY ( UserID ) ;


CREATE TABLE TempUsers
  (
    UserID          NUMBER GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ,
    RegistrationNo  VARCHAR2 (30) NOT NULL UNIQUE ,
    Name            VARCHAR2 (80) NOT NULL ,
    Class           VARCHAR2 (10) NOT NULL ,
    Email           VARCHAR2 (80) NOT NULL UNIQUE ,
    Password        VARCHAR2 (30) NOT NULL,
    Address         VARCHAR2 (80) NOT NULL,
    Phone	    VARCHAR2 (15) NOT NULL,
    Picture         VARCHAR2 (80) NOT NULL
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Users ADD CONSTRAINT TempUsers_PK PRIMARY KEY ( UserID ) ;


CREATE TABLE Threads
  (
    ThreadID        NUMBER GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ,
    UserID          NUMBER NOT NULL ,
    ThreadTitle     VARCHAR2 (50) NOT NULL ,
    ThreadText      VARCHAR2 (4000) NOT NULL
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Threads ADD CONSTRAINT Threads_PK PRIMARY KEY ( ThreadID ) ;


CREATE TABLE ThreadComments
  (
    CommentID       NUMBER GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ,
    ThreadID        NUMBER NOT NULL ,
    UserID          NUMBER NOT NULL ,
    CommentText     VARCHAR2 (1000) NOT NULL
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE ThreadComments ADD CONSTRAINT ThreadComments_PK PRIMARY KEY ( CommentID ) ;
